Pacakges in tidyMass project

packages.Rmd

massConverter


massconverter is used to convert mass spectrometry raw data to other format data (mzXML, mxML, etc.). More information…


massDataset


massdataset is used organize metabolomics experiment data into a mass_dataset class object, that can be processed by all the tidymass packages. More information…


massProcesser


massprocesser is used for LC-MS based untargeted metabolomics raw data processing. More information…


massCleaner


masscleaner is used for data cleaning. More information…



massQC


massqc is used for data quality assessment and control. More information…



metID


metid is used for metabolite database construction and metabolite annotation. More information…



massStat


massstat is used for statistical analysis. More information…



metPath


metpath is used for pathway enrichment analysis. More information…



massTools


masstools is a collection of useful tiny tools. More information…
